ModMetaData.name: Impassable Fences
ModMetaData.author: Burusutzu
ModMetaData.description:
Sick of your colonists walking over that fence for no reason? Or your precious chickens being slaughtered by wild animals? Well you are in luck because this mod exists!
Please note that this mod sorta breaks the game. Melee enemies will have their path-finding broken by this if your colonists hide inside the fence.
Shoutout to the Etalyx discord server.
